title: FS: T206 Bell (Hands over head) **MISSING COLOR**  SOLD!!
author: T3s

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Bell (Hands over head) **MISSING COLOR**  SOLD!!
posts.post_content:
I've owned this card for about 15yrs.  The full-color example is not mine (just showing it for contrast) and I apologize for the odd cropping, couldn't figure out how to blend them properly.

As you can see, the red, pink, brown, etc is missing.  He's nearly white as a ghost.  The scan is huge and it make the creasing appear more pronounced than it really is.  The back is a clean Piedmont 150 (shown below)

I've recieved a variety of inputs as to value on this one - really anywhere from $100 - $1200+.  The card is for sale.  Please let me know if you have an interest and an offer.  I don't need top dollar on this card, but think it's valuable and very unique.  PM me or email me.  Thanks in advance.

Best,
Craig
unique piece Craig, I have never seen that...Good luck
